titles.title: TRICARE Equity Act
To waive copayments and deductibles for military personnel who qualify for TRICARE and use other health insurance as their primary form of coverage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Total Force.

bill.summary: 12/8/2003--Introduced. TRICARE Equity Act - Prohibits any member or former member (or dependent of such member) of the armed forces who is eligible for benefits under the TRICARE program (a Department of Defense managed health care program) and who has another insurance plan or program that provides primary coverage for health benefits from being required to pay any copayment or annual deductible under the TRICARE program.
